en.and_complete_prompts: and complete the prompts that pop-up on your device
en.convenient_secure_replacement: A convenient and more secure replacement for passwords
en.enables_sign_by_unlocking: Enables you to sign into dapps by unlocking your device (e.g. using FaceID or TouchID)
en.what_happens_save_passkey: What happens when I save a Passkey?
en.your_device_prompt_authenticate: Your device will prompt you to authenticate (with FaceID, TouchID or another method that unlocks your device) so that it can create and save a unique cryptographic key pair that you will use to access Internet Identity
en.no_personal_data: No personal data is shared with Internet Identity nor the dapps that use Internet Identity
en.no_software_downloaded: No software is downloaded to your device
